title: skyland999
author: skyland999
content: Good afternoon guys, it's been a while since my last time on this forum and crypto and i really need some good recommendation about blockchain-based storage project out there beside Storj, any thoughts?

comments.author: MakiHasegawa
comments.body: Well storj was good already but if you are looking the others maybe you can check and try Bittorent or Arweave, both of them was really good and i personally already use arweave a lot of time.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Aside from the mentioned above, I think the closest and most known of them all is Siacoin. It's one of the projects that I've known but I have never held it.Another one is the filecoin.It's one of the top 50 coin in the market so that will give you another option if you're on this type of protocol or algorithm.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: skyland999 on June 08, 2022, 07:38:56 PMGood afternoon guys, it's been a while since my last time on this forum and crypto and i really need some good recommendation about blockchain-based storage project out there beside Storj, any thoughts?Like another member already said besides Storj there are also Filecoin and Siacoin which i know of. If i remember correctly Filecoin had the biggest ICO ever within the crypto space because they collected 257 Million USD back in september of 2017. That being said back then ICO's did not have a hard cap so everyone could basically invest, which also means that there are a lot of holders now that bought for the ICO price.I held some Siacoin myself and also mined a little Siacoin from time to time a few years ago before ASICs for Siacoin were introduced and you could still mine with GPU's. If i remember correctly Siacoin needs a very high adoption and usage in order to not be inflationary anymore.

comments.body: I will add a few more SIA and Maidsafe projects.https://maidsafe.net/https://sia.tech/I have not been following these projects for a long time, but they have not gained much popularity for a long time.If you are asking about investing in such projects, then I would probably not advise you to do this now.
